channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Citrus pepper pork with crushed potatoes
item.description:
Citrus pepper pork with crushed potatoes



Step-by-step method for making Citrus pepper pork with crushed potatoes yourself..

item.title: Lemony chicken with roast veg and olives
item.description:
Lemony chicken with roast veg and olives



This speedy spring chicken is served with roasted veggies and olives .

item.title: Whole eggs in coconut masala
item.description:
Whole eggs in coconut masala



This is a nice, simple vegetarian egg curry with a delicate coconut masala. The whole eggs are fried first then finished off in the curry. .

item.title: Salmon and spring veg orzo
item.description:
Salmon and spring veg orzo



Use orzo or your favourite small pasta to make this speedy salmon supper for midweek.

item.title: Butterscotch blondie bars
item.description:
Butterscotch blondie bars



The addition of fudge and pecans elevate these rich blondies to a new level. Take care not to overbake to ensure a chewy, gooey middle..

item.title: Broccoli cheese soup
item.description:
Broccoli cheese soup



In the world of cheaty foods, broccoli cheese soup has always seemed like one of the cheatiest. There's nothing wrong with owning it: Cheese is delicious, and not every single lunch has to be virtuous. Still, I sometimes wish that the broccoli part of the whole thing was taken a little more seriously, if only for the purely selfish reason that I love broccoli. My goal here was to create a recipe for broccoli cheese soup that was as comforting as the ultra-cheesy kind you typically find, but simultaneously really tasted like broccoli..
